item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! My name is Shixian Wang, and I was born in 2003. Currently, I am a third-year student at the University of Ottawa, majoring in accounting. As an aspiring accountant, I have always been fascinated by the world of numbers and finances. It’s incredible how they can tell a story and provide insights into the workings of a business.
